name: CornerChaos FREE
description:
Roll balls into the grooved play area. Create groups of 4 or more of the same color. Groups of balls are removed from the game, leaving you more space to work with. Create cascades, and double groups to win more points! Whatever you do, don't run out of space!

Sit back and relax, as this is a game of organization, and logic. There is no need for fast paced action, you can play as fast or as slow as you like!

Features:
- Very simple to learn
- 13 different balls, and a Joker Ball
- Auto-save and auto-continue
- Popping, Bouncing, Shiny Balls!
